alert.note: Alert for Cherokee (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freezing Fog Advisory issued December 17 at 1:25AM CST until December 17 at 8:00AM CST by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...FREEZING FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM CST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility one half mile or less in freezing fog. * WHERE...In Kansas, Cherokee County. In Missouri, Jasper, Newton, McDonald and Barry Counties. * WHEN...Until 8 AM CST this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility and potential frost on bridges. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Lowest visibilities will be observed near the Missouri/Arkansas border. Those farther north will see visibilities of 3 to 5 miles.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you. Also, be alert for frost on bridge decks causing slippery roads.
